properties.name: zeta.auth.encryption.master-key
properties.description: AES-256-GCM master key for OAuth2 token encryption at rest. Must be a Base64-encoded 32-byte (256-bit) key. Sourced from the ZETA_ENCRYPTION_MASTER_KEY Kubernetes Secret.

properties.name: zeta.auth.internal.hmac-secret
properties.description: HMAC-SHA256 secret used to sign and verify internal JWT tokens.

properties.name: zeta.auth.internal.token-validity-seconds
properties.description: Validity duration in seconds for internally issued JWT tokens. Defaults to 3600 (1 hour).
